idea-plugin.name: VimMulticursor
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful IdeaVim extension that enables multiple cursors and selections using Vim commands. Use the `mc` prefix for multiple cursors or `ms` prefix for multiple selections, followed by any supported Vim command. When text is selected, all commands operate within the selection.
Supported Commands: • Navigation - mcw/mcW: Add cursors at next words start. - mcb/mcB: Add cursors at previous words start. - mce/mcE: Add cursors at words end. - mcfx/mcFx: Add cursors at all occurrences of character x. - mc/ + search: Add cursors at all occurrences of search regex.
• Around text objects with cursors - mcaw: Around word - mca + bracket: Around bracket, like `mca(`/`mcab`, `mca{`/`mcaB`, `mca"`, etc - mci + bracket: Inside bracket, like `mci(`/`mcib`, `mci{`/`mciB`, `mci"`, etc - Any bracket: mcaa/mcia (smart matching)
• Cursor Management - mcc: Add/remove a cursor highlight at current position - mcr: Convert cursor highlights to active editing cursors - mcd: Clear all cursors and highlights
Full guide: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
